title: Secrets on Relationships
description: Our lives revolve around relationships. Yet, in today's strange world, humans are having more difficulties than ever connecting to each other. Priya Majumdar explains why this is the case, through hilarious stories and inspiring, sagely advice. She also goes on to reveal some of the most powerful secrets on how you can take charge of owning the relationships in your life. This is a no-fluff guide, designed for a quick read in the middle of your busy life.  Become a master, make total changes, and start living the awesome life you've dreamed of today! Part of a seven-book series.  Get this book FREE with Kindle Unlimited!
author: Priya Majumdar
